mapper.select: SELECT A.CUST_ID, A.CUST_NM, A.ADDRESS, A.PHONE FROM CUSTOMER A

SELECT A.CUST_ID, A.CUST_NM, B.TOT_AMT FROM CUSTOMER A INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.CUST_ID, SUM(B.QTY*B.UNIT_PRICE) TOT_AMT FROM ORDERS A INNER JOIN ORDERS_DET B ON A.ORD_ID = B.ORD_ID GROUP BY A.CUST_ID ) B ON A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER(CUST_ID, CUST_NM, ADDRESS, PHONE) VALUES( #{custId}, #{custNm}, #{address}, #{phone} )
